headline: Pinnacol Assurance Named to Ward's 50 Superior Insurance Providers for Eighth Consecutive Year
summary: Pinnacol Assurance, Colorado's leading workers' compensation insurer, today announced its eighth consecutive placement on the Ward's 50 list of top-performing property-casualty insurance companies in the United States. This prestigious recognition, awarded by Aon, highlights Pinnacol's unwavering commitment to financial stability, operational excellence and exceptional service to Colorado businesses.
